Nice correlationmatrix

nice_corrmatrix.Rd

From a psych corr object it gives a correlationmatrix formated for overview

nice_corrmatrix(cr, upper = TRUE, lower = TRUE, alpha = 0.1,
  digits = 2, n_sig, values = TRUE, stars = TRUE, autocor = "-",
  square = FALSE, caption = "Correlation matrix.", sig.10 = "✝  ",
  type = "df")

Arguments

cr

A correlation matrix returned by the psych package
upper

TRUE if upper triangle should be included
lower

TRUE if lower triangle should be included
alpha

Alpha level
digits

Round to given digit position
n_sig

Charcter indexing non-significant values
values

TRUE if values should be included
stars

TRUE if stars should be included
autocor

Character for diagonal (e.g. "-" or "1.00")
square

Report squared r instead of r
caption

Caption for a html table.
sig.10

Character indexing .10 sognificance level
type

Charcater string. "df" for data-frame. "html" for html table (needs knitr and kableExtra packages)

Value

A data-frame or a html table object

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
